participant_abstract.sent: The meeting introduced each member of the group to her collegues, and outlined the first steps of the new project: designing and creating a remote control.
As an icebreaker, we drew animals on the whiteboard and discussed why the animals were our favourites.
Afterwards, we discussed our aims for the project and brainstormed a few design concepts.
We intend to charge double the cost of production for the remote.
In closing, we were assigned projects to address before the next meeting.

participant_actions.sent: They'll probably come up with design and marketing ideas.

participant_decisions.sent: What problems with remote controls we'd like to address.

participant_problems.sent: I didn't always know what I was supposed to talk about with the power point.
It feels strange to act authoritative over something that isn't real.
How do I take minutes while hosting the meeting?
I didn't have enough space to draw my elk's feet.
